Question.Subject: I ordered an item from amazon and chose one day shipping and it says it wont be here til a month?
Question.Content: Ok so last night I ordered an airsoft gun and selected the one day shipping yet the estimated time delivery said it wont get to my house until April 22nd! I already payed like 15 bucks for one day shipping how is this fair?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
1-day shipping is a bit deceiving. Although they WILL ship the item that fast, it may not be available to BE shipped for weeks. I would follow the advice of the previous responder. Contact Customer Support and cancel the order.
I no longer use Amazon

Answer.Content: Contact Amazon support. The item is obviously not in stock

1-day shipping is a bit deceiving. Although they WILL ship the item that fast, it may not be available to BE shipped for weeks. I would follow the advice of the previous responder. Contact Customer Support and cancel the order.
I no longer use Amazon
